name: @ngrx/store
description: RxJS powered Redux for Angular2 apps

scripts.build_test: npm run clean_test && tsc typings/tsd.d.ts spec/store_spec.ts spec/helpers/test-helper.ts -m commonjs --outDir tmp --target ES5 -d --diagnostics
scripts.build_src: tsc typings/tsd.d.ts src/store.ts --target es5 --module commonjs --outDir tmp

author: Rob Wormald <robwormald@gmail.com>
